tool.name: tex
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the TeX formatter and typesetter.
tool.sets: TEX TEXFLAGS TEXCOM LATEX LATEXFLAGS LATEXCOM BIBTEX BIBTEXFLAGS BIBTEXCOM MAKEINDEX MAKEINDEXFLAGS MAKEINDEXCOM

cvar.name: BIBTEX
cvar.summary: The bibliography generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: BIBTEXCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to call the bibliography generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: BIBTEXCOMSTR
cvar.summary:
The string displayed when generating a bibliography for TeX or LaTeX. If this is not set, then &cv-link-BIBTEXCOM; (the command line) is displayed.
env = Environment(BIBTEXCOMSTR = "Generating bibliography $TARGET")

cvar.name: BIBTEXFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the bibliography generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: MAKEINDEX
cvar.summary: The makeindex generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: MAKEINDEXCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to call the makeindex generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: MAKEINDEXCOMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when calling the makeindex generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter. If this is not set, then &cv-link-MAKEINDEXCOM; (the command line) is displayed.

cvar.name: MAKEINDEXFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the makeindex generator for the TeX formatter and typesetter and the LaTeX structured formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: TEXCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to call the TeX formatter and typesetter.

cvar.name: TEXCOMSTR
cvar.summary:
The string displayed when calling the TeX formatter and typesetter. If this is not set, then &cv-link-TEXCOM; (the command line) is displayed.
env = Environment(TEXCOMSTR = "Building $TARGET from TeX input $SOURCES")

cvar.name: TEXFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the TeX formatter and typesetter.
